Text:
Thanks dohduhdah, my appreciation for your contributions is really beyond measure. I can but hope and wish your efforts will persist for a very long time, and in so doing always being aware of my and many others' deep gratitude. You're the man, truly.

Do you by any chance have access to "Italian Renaissance", by Kenneth Bartlett, in video format? I have been searching fruitlessly for it, suddenly realizing I may be so bold as to actually request it of you. Thank you in advance and best regards.
Sure no problem.. "Italian Renaissance" video added to my TPB upload queue.
